item.description:
Revealed

This June, we will be hosting our first Spirit Gallery. Our intention is to highlight work of an artist that focuses on Spirituality.

For our Inaugural Spirit Gallery, we have invited photographer Scott Indermaur to present his Revealed Project. Scott invited various individuals to ponder how they would represent their spirituality and photographed them.

A select collection of his beautiful portraits will be adorning the walls of the Church from June 1st through June 26.

On Fridady, June 15th from 7PM, we will have a special Gallery Evening. We welcome the artist who will share insights gathered through his project, and view a short film on the project created by Christian de Rezendes of Breaking Branches Pictures.

Scott has agreed to sign copies of his recently published book that includes a more extensive collection of these wonderful portraits of human spirituality as manifested by the models.

June 15, 2012, 7:00PM

group.name: The First Spiritualist Church of Quincy

item.name: Inaugural Spirit Gallery: Revealed
